description: GeoMIP experiments apply geoengineering methods that modify stratospheric sulfate aerosol, solar irradiance and cirrus clouds to specified DECK and ScenarioMIP experiments.
keywords: geoengineering, sulphur injection, solar, cirrus, albedo
label: GeoMIP
rationale: Assessing the climate system response (including on extreme events) to proposed radiation modification geoengineering schemes by evaluating their efficacies, benefits, and side effects.
